skill.name: Acrobatics
skill.comment: Acrobatics measures your ability to perform tasks requiring coordination and grace.

skill.name: Arcana
skill.comment: Arcana measures how much you know about arcane magic and creatures.
skill.recallKnowledgeSpecialization: arcane theories; magic traditions; creatures of arcane significance (like dragons and beasts); and the Elemental, Astral, and Shadow Planes

skill.name: Athletics
skill.comment: Athletics allows you to perform deeds of physical prowess.

skill.name: Crafting
skill.comment: You can use this skill to create and repair items.
skill.recallKnowledgeSpecialization: alchemical reactions, the value of items, engineering, unusual materials, and alchemical or mechanical creatures

skill.name: Deception
skill.comment: You can trick and mislead others using disguises, lies, and other forms of subterfuge.

skill.name: Lore
skill.comment: You have specialized information on a narrow topic.
skill.recallKnowledgeSpecialization: subject of your Lore skillâ€™s subcategory

skill.name: Medicine
skill.comment: You can patch up wounds and help people recover from diseases and poisons.
skill.recallKnowledgeSpecialization: diseases, injuries, poisons, and other ailments

skill.name: Nature
skill.comment: You know about the natural world, and you command and train animals and magical beasts.
skill.recallKnowledgeSpecialization: fauna, flora, geography, weather, the environment, creatures of natural origin (like animals, beasts, fey, and plants), the First World, the Material Plane, and the Elemental Planes

skill.name: Occultism
skill.comment: You know a great deal about ancient philosophies, esoteric lore, obscure mysticism, and supernatural creatures.
skill.recallKnowledgeSpecialization: ancient mysteries; obscure philosophies; creatures of occult significance (like aberrations, spirits, and oozes); and the Positive Energy, Negative Energy, Shadow, Astral, and Ethereal Planes

skill.name: Performance
skill.comment: You are skilled at a form of performance, using your talents to impress a crowd or make a living.

skill.name: Religion
skill.comment: The secrets of deities, dogma, faith, and the realms of divine creatures both sublime and sinister are open to you. You also understand how magic works, though your training imparts a religious slant to that knowledge.
skill.recallKnowledgeSpecialization: divine agents, the finer points of theology, obscure myths regarding a faith, and creatures of religious significance (like celestials, fiends, and undead), the Outer Sphere, and the Positive and Negative Energy Planes

skill.name: Society
skill.comment: You understand the people and systems that make civilization run, and you know the historical events that make societies what they are today.
skill.recallKnowledgeSpecialization: local history, important personalities, legal institutions, societal structure, and humanoid cultures

skill.name: Stealth
skill.comment: You are skilled at avoiding detection, allowing you to slip past foes, hide, or conceal an item.

skill.name: Survival
skill.comment: You are adept at living in the wilderness, foraging for food and building shelter, and with training you discover the secrets of tracking and hiding your trail.

skill.name: Thievery
skill.comment: You are trained in a particular set of skills favored by thieves and miscreants.
